page.title: 14Recreation in Arundel
page.content: Arundel Community centre has many facilities; there is a library, clinic and chiropodist downstairs, whilst 3 upstairs halls are used for activities such as toddler group, youth club, bingo, karate club etc. Keep fit classes, ballet and assorted dancing classes for all ages are held in St. Mary's hall. There is a cricket club west of the town, a football club and a tennis club with three courts. The open air swimming pool has a slide and diving boards and often has late night swims. Other facilties offered are games and slides for children, tabletennis, putting and a shop selling food and hot and cold drinks. There are also disco dances.
